Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui

Class InitState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.TUIstate
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.InitState
public class InitState extends TUIstate
Initial state of the TUI. The client remains in this state until it creates or joins a game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.TUIstate

  • Constructor Details

    • InitState

      protected InitState(TUI tui)
      Constructor for the InitState, calls the initialize method and set the stateName to "Init State"
      Parameters:
      tui - the TUI instance that will use this state

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      protected void initialize()
      User-executable commands for the InitState
      • help - Shows commands info
      • create game - Create a new game
      • show games - Shows all the active games
      • join game - Join an existing game
      Specified by:
      initialize in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • initialize()
      • JoinedToGameState.initialize()
      • PlayingState.initialize()

    • command_createGame

      protected void command_createGame()
      Asks the user to type the number of players for the new game and sends the corresponding request to the Controller (socket) or RmiServer(rmi). Blocks the cmdLineReaderThread until the Controller or RmiServer responds with
      invalid reference 
      ShowUpdate#show_gameCreated(int)
      Specified by:
      command_createGame in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • invalid reference 
        ClientCommands#createGame(int)
      • invalid reference 
        Controller#createGame(String, int)

    • command_showGames

      protected void command_showGames()
      Sends the request to the Controller to show the list of available games. Blocks the cmdLineReaderThread until the Controller responds with
      invalid reference 
      ShowUpdate#show_listGame(java.util.List)
      Specified by:
      command_showGames in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • invalid reference 
        Controller#getGameList(String)
      • invalid reference 
        ClientCommands#getGameList()

    • command_joinGame

      protected void command_joinGame()
      Sends the request to the Controller to join the game with the typed gameID. Blocks the cmdLineReaderThread until the Controller responds with
      invalid reference 
      ShowUpdate#show_gameIsFull(int)
      or
      invalid reference 
      ShowUpdate#show_gameDoesNotExist()
      Specified by:
      command_joinGame in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • invalid reference 
        ClientCommands#joinGame(int)
      • invalid reference 
        Controller#joinGame(String, int)

    • setUsername

      protected void setUsername()
      Asks the user to type the username and sends the corresponding request to the Controller(socket) or RmiServer(rmi). Blocks the cmdLineReaderThread until the Controller or RmiServer responds with
      invalid reference 
      ShowUpdate#show_validUsername(String)
      or or
      invalid reference 
      ShowUpdate#show_wrongUsername(String)
      or
      invalid reference 
      invalid input: '@see ClientCommands#setUsernameCall(String)'
      Specified by:
      setUsername in class TUIstate
      See Also:
      • setUsername()
      • ClientCommands.setUsernameCall(String)
